title: 05/17/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/17/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend that was in basketball. Should Tim Duncan be in the conversation as a Top 5 player of all time? What would Kobe's Hall of Speech have been like? LA Times Columnist Bill Plaschke previews the Warriors/Lakers Play in game. Does Lebron truly believe Steph is the MVP? And, Hall of Famer Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit stop to discuss whether Lakers fans should be concerned.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
